name: x-accuracy
effect: Used on a party Pokémon in battle : Raises the target’s accuracy by one stage. Increases happiness by 1/1/0.
short_effect: Raises accuracy by one stage in battle. Raises happiness.

flavor_text.ruby-sapphire: Raises accuracy of attack moves during one battle.
flavor_text.emerald: Raises accuracy of attack moves during one battle.
flavor_text.firered-leafgreen: Raises the accuracy stat of POKéMON in battle. Wears off if the POKéMON is withdrawn.
